plugins.name: ChromaCraft
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows users to select a single element on the canvas. It analyzes the color of the selected element and determines whether it's a light or dark color. Based on this analysis, it generates a new color that is either darker or lighter and creates a visual representation of this new color beside the selected element. The plugin also takes care of font loading and positioning the new color representation appropriately.

plugins.description:

Embedded Wizard Connect for Figma simplifies the workflow between designers and embedded developers. Instead of recreating designs from scratch in Embedded Wizard Studio, you can now start with GUI layouts from Figma and bring the design to life more quickly.

-Simplified Workflow: Embedded Wizard converts Figma designs into implementable code suited for embedded systems, eliminating manual efforts and reducing development time.

plugins.name: I18n exporter
plugins.description:
Tabbed JSON Viewer for Figma


Transform your text variables into JSON format required by i18n libraries for language translations directly within Figma!


How It Works

Prepare Your Variables: Ensure your variable collections are correctly named i18n in Figma. This is crucial for the plugin to identify and process the variables meant for internationalization.


Fetch Variables: Click on the Get Variables button to automatically fetch and transform your project's i18n variables into a structured JSON format.


View and Copy: The plugin conveniently displays your variables in a tabbed interface, organized by language. Simply select the desired language tab to view the JSON output. Use the copy button to copy the JSON to your clipboard for easy integration into your i18n workflow.


Clear JSON: Want to start over or clean up? Click Clear JSON to reset the output area.


Features

Easy-to-use Interface: A user-friendly UI with a tabbed display allows for seamless navigation and operation.

Efficient Variable Conversion: Quickly converts your Figma text variables into i18n-compatible JSON.

Flexible Copy Options: Copy individual languages or the entire JSON output with a single click.


Getting Started

To get started, ensure your variable collections within Figma are named i18n. This naming convention is essential for the plugin to recognize and process your text variables for translation. Once set up, click on the Get Variables button to convert and view your variables in JSON format.


Whether you're developing multilingual designs or working on international projects, this plugin simplifies the translation process by seamlessly integrating with your i18n libraries.


Enhance your design workflow and embrace global accessibility with the Tabbed JSON Viewer for Figma.


Note: This plugin is an independent tool designed to facilitate the conversion of text variables to JSON for i18n libraries. It is not an official i18n plugin or affiliated with any official i18n library developers.
plugins.tagline: I18n exporter

plugins.name: Automator: Automate hundreds of creatives instantly.
plugins.description:
Want to create hundreds of creatives instantly? Well now you can!


Introducing Automator, a plugin built to make executing multiple creatives quick and easy.


How does it work?

Automator takes your existing creatives within Figma and applies data to that creative from a spreadsheet. You can simply drag your spreadsheet of data into Automator and it will convert that data into creatives. The only thing you need to do is make sure that your item names match the headers in your spreadsheet. The data can consist of text and images (note that images need to be served from a URL).


For best results make sure that you have you prepared your 'template' creatives in a way that work best for your data. Make sure that your text boxes are sized in a way that the new text can fit, such as keeping the box boundaries within the creative space. Automator automatically resizes the text to fit the text box, so keep that in mind when it comes to text that you don't want to be larger than a button or text that goes over an focal point of an image.
plugins.tagline: Automate hundreds of creatives instantly.

plugins.name: Source DS Utils
plugins.description:
Bunch of utilities for Source Design System and Source Foundation plugin. I feel like these automations can be useful for everyone who designs in Figma.


This is a UI-less plugin that uses Figma quick actions to run automations.


Export component templates

Select components or frames with components and run the command to copy all these components as frames. You can use these copies to import component templates back.


Import component templates

Select a frame with exported component templates and run the command. This command will either replace target component content with the contents of the template or it will merge layers


Fix layers

Sometimes Figma does not resize absolutely positioned layers when you update something rapidly. When you spot such rouge layers went off you can fix them with this automation.


This command finds all absolutely positioned layers inside auto layout frames and snaps their size back to fit the parent.


Create color Styles

This command will create colour styles that are bound to the variables of the same name.


Clone component

Effortlessly clone any component or component set. When you copy/paste a simple component with lots of properties Figma creates a component instance. This automation creates an identical copy with all the properties available.


Make local component

Simplify workflow for slot components. This automation takes the instance inside another component, creates a local copy of that instance, makes it a component and swaps it with that component.


Slot to local component

Simplify workflow for slot components. This automation takes the instance, checks instance swap properties and enables you to swap it with newly created component. Lear more here -> https://forum.figma.com/t/slot-component-workflow-plugin/93749


Update Elevation Components

This is Source Design System specific automation. It reads effect styles and updates custom-made elevation components to match effect shadows.


Set Playground

Mark any file as Source Foundation Playground. This plugin uses figma.root.setPluginData method from plugin API to toggle 'SDSPlayground' property.
plugins.tagline: Automations for Source Design system

plugins.name: DSekon Auto Layout
plugins.description:
The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.


  1.  Launch the plugin. The UI panel opens.
  2. Select a bunch of items.
  3. Use button “+” to create an adaptive auto layout.
  4. Change the frame width.
  5. The elements will be rearranged automatically (The elements will also be rebuilt when the elements inside the frame are changed, except for deletion).


IMPORTANT: To automatically rearranged the elements, the UI panel must be open.


The plugin has the ability to sort the elements inside the frame in alphabetical order.


DSekon.com

Donate

plugins.name: QR Code Generator – Create Free Custom SVG QR Codes in Figma
plugins.description:
Generate sleek, customizable SVG QR codes in Figma! Free plugin with easy color, corner, and background adjustments. Perfect for professional designs.


🎨 Adjust colors,

🟪 Tweak corners,

💫 Fine-tune backgrounds,

🌈 Match your design style.



------------------------------------------------------



Plus UI QR Code Generator is a powerful and intuitive Figma Plugin designed to revolutionize the way designers create and implement QR Codes for Figma projects. Whether you need a Custom QR Code for a branding campaign, a digital product, or a marketing asset, this plugin provides everything you need, directly integrated into your favorite Design Tool.


With this Free Plugin, you can effortlessly generate SVG QR Codes, ensuring that every code you create is crisp, scalable, and ready for any digital or print application. The plugin offers a seamless Figma Customization experience, allowing you to adjust colors, shapes, and backgrounds to match your unique style. Create Colorful QR Codes that pop and attract attention, all while maintaining the integrity and professionalism of your design.


Plus UI QR Code Generator is ideal for designers working on projects that require advanced Branding elements. Whether you’re designing for a major marketing campaign, a sleek mobile app, or a company’s digital identity, this tool fits perfectly into any Design Workflow. Its smooth and intuitive interface allows for quick creation of professional QR codes, making it a must-have in any Digital Design toolkit.


One of the standout features of this Figma Plugin is its adaptability to complex Design Systems. If you’re managing a large-scale design project with multiple assets and components, you’ll appreciate how easily Plus UI QR Code Generator integrates with your existing system, helping you maintain visual consistency across platforms.


From enhancing User Interface designs with embedded QR codes to creating dynamic links for marketing materials, this plugin offers an effortless way to generate professional codes that align with your project’s aesthetic and functionality. Whether you’re crafting a digital business card, an event invitation, or a product tag, Plus UI QR Code Generator empowers you to create versatile, brand-consistent solutions.


In today’s fast-paced design landscape, efficiency and creativity are essential. This plugin streamlines the process of incorporating QR Codes for Figma, freeing you to focus on what you do best – designing beautiful and functional experiences. Say goodbye to generic QR codes and hello to stunning, customized solutions with Plus UI QR Code Generator.

plugins.name: FigShare Links
plugins.description:
FigShare Intro:

  1. Seamlessly & Instantly Embed Your Figma Designs Everywhere
  2. With FigShare, embedding your Figma designs on websites and other platforms is effortless.
  3. No more jumping between tools to update assets—just manage everything directly from Figma.


Official Website:

  1. https://www.figshare.xyz/


Why FigShare?

  1. ✅ Automatic Updates with Every Publish
  2. ✅ Publish changes in Figma, and FigShare automatically reflects them in your embedded images.
  3. ✅ No more back-and-forth between designers and developers to keep assets up-to-date.


Where Can You Use FigShare?

You can embed FigShare images almost anywhere, including:

  1. Slack, Linkedin, X, Reddit, and more...
  2. Design System Documentation
  3. Blog Posts
  4. Social Media Banners & Covers
  5. Link Meta Previews
  6. Portfolios & Websites


Turn your Figma designs into instant, shareable links.

  1. Instant Links: Generate shareable links for any frame or image in seconds.
  2. Seamless Collaboration: Share specific design sections effortlessly with your team or clients.
  3. Real-Time Updates: Links automatically reflect your latest design


Pricing

  1. Try FigShare for free with up to 10 images. Need more? Upgrade anytime for $5/month to unlock additional images.
  2. For team accounts that allow shared access across multiple users, contact us directly to explore options.


With FigShare, say goodbye to workflow friction and hello to effortless design updates.
plugins.tagline: Instant Links for Any Figma Design Element

This tool shows you any instances within the current selection.

plugins.name: Figma to PostGrid
plugins.description:
Figma to PostGrid


The Figma to PostGrid Plugin is built for designers and developers, letting you easily export your Figma designs into ready-to-use PostGrid templates. This means you can leverage the power of Figma's design tools to create stunning and personalized direct mail pieces, all without leaving Figma.


What can you do with the Plugin?


  1. Works great with how you already design: No need to make major shifts within your systems, tools and tech stacks, the plugin works seamlessly with your existing design workflow!
  2. One-click export: Export your beautiful designs directly into PostGrid with just a few clicks.
  3. Make it yours: Use merge variables to add personalized information to each piece of mail, making it unique.
  4. Ditch the PDFs: Forget about static PDFs and create mailers that are more engaging and interactive.


How to get started


  1. Open the plugin in your Figma workspace.
  2. Sign in using your PostGrid account credentials or add the test/live API key.
  3. Click on "Create Template" to add the supported template and create the collateral from scratch.
  4. Click on "Export Template" once you are ready with the collateral design.


Access the detailed guide to help you get started.


Reach out to support@postgrid.com if you have any questions or issues.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly convert Figma designs into dynamic PostGrid direct mail templates.

plugins.name: Filla - Color Palette Extractor
plugins.description:
What it does

Filla dives through every nested layer; shapes, text, vectors, icons, and pulls out every unique solid and gradient fill or stroke. It then drops those colours into a neat swatch grid on-canvas, each labelled with its HEX value. One click turns the whole set into named Figma Color Styles.


How to use:

1. Select any parent frame, component, or section.

2. Run Filla → watch the deep scan.

3. Review the generated palette.

4. Hit Create Styles to add them to your library.


Why it’s handy

• Kick-start a design system by surfacing legacy colours.

• Audit messy files and spot duplicates fast.

• Hand off a clear colour spec to developers in seconds.
plugins.tagline: Extract every colour in any selection, auto-build a palette, and convert to Color Styles.

plugins.name: ComfyUI-Image-Generator-Advance
plugins.description:
ComfyUI Image Generator Advance

Seamlessly Integrate Any ComfyUI Workflow

Powered by Comfy Deploy, this plugin bridges Figma with limitless AI workflows. Unleash unparalleled freedom to connect Figma and AI—customize, innovate, and create without boundaries!


---


Features

Unlock ComfyUI’s Full Potential:

Every feature ComfyUI offers is at your fingertips. If you can build it in ComfyUI, you can integrate it with Figma for AI-powered image generation!

Endless Customization:

Turn complex workflows into streamlined Figma actions.


---


Quick Start Guide

  1. Registeron: deploy.comfyui.asia
  2. Install the comfyui-deploy plugin in ComfyUI and configure your workflow . see tutorial.
  3. Deploy your workflow on deploy.comfyui.asia , configure GPU settings (you can use your own GPU), and obtain your API key.
  4. Launch the ComfyUI Image Generator Advance plugin in Figma, enter your API key, and start generating—your custom workflow parameters will auto-load!


FAQ


Q: Is this plugin free?

A: We offer affordable paid plans to cover server costs and future upgrades. Your support keeps the innovation alive! 💡


Q: Why are generated images downscaled?

A: To ensure smooth data transfer and avoid bottlenecks, images are temporarily resized to a max of 1536 px on the longest edge. For full resolution, use upscaling workflows after initial processing.


Q: Why do requests sometimes fail?

A: ComfyUI’s API is still evolving. Check your browser console for errors, refresh the plugin, or retry the task. Ensure stable internet—**VPN required for users in mainland China**.


Q: Are servers located in China?

A: No. Due to AI regulations and licensing complexities, servers are hosted overseas. Users in China may experience slight latency; a stable VPN connection is recommended.


---


Full Documentation** → Get Started

Explore More→ Visit Our Official Site


---


Why Choose Us?

  1. Flexible Workflows: Your creativity, your rules.
  2. Global Scalability: Cloud-powered performance, wherever you are.
  3. Pro-Level Control: Perfect for designers and developers alike.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Integrate Any ComfyUI Workflow

plugins.name: Fast make grid
plugins.description:
🎛️ Grid Generator

Grid Generator es una herramienta que diseñé para crear grillas dinámicas y bien estructuradas basadas en frameworks populares como Bootstrap y Foundation. Mi objetivo fue simplificar la configuración de columnas, breakpoints y márgenes para tus diseños, garantizando precisión y ahorrándote tiempo.


Ya sea que estés trabajando en un diseño responsive, configurando un sistema de diseño o ajustando márgenes precisos, Grid Generator te ofrece la flexibilidad que necesitas para que te concentres en lo importante: ¡diseñar! ✨


✅ Soporte para Frameworks Populares

Genera grillas ajustadas a los breakpoints de:

  1. Bootstrap: Desde xs hasta xxl.
  2. Foundation: Desde small hasta xlarge.


✅ Contenedores Dinámicos

Configura contenedores:

  1. Fixed: Se ajusta al ancho del breakpoint seleccionado.
  2. Fluid: Se adapta al ancho completo del frame.


✅ Márgenes Automáticos

Agrega márgenes externos dinámicos en contenedores Fixed, calculados según el framework seleccionado:

  1. Bootstrap: 12px por lado.
  2. Foundation: 16px por lado.


✅ Cálculo Preciso de Columnas

El plugin ajusta el tamaño de las columnas automáticamente según el ancho disponible, restando márgenes y gutters para garantizar una alineación perfecta.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Selecciona un Frame
  2. Asegúrate de tener un frame seleccionado para aplicar la grilla.
  3. Configura la Grilla
  4. Escoge un framework (Bootstrap o Foundation).
  5. Selecciona un breakpoint.
  6. Define el tipo de contenedor (Fixed o Fluid).
  7. Elige el número de columnas (4 o 12).
  8. Haz clic en "Generar Grilla" para aplicar la configuración al frame.


Opcional: Agregar Márgenes

Si el contenedor es Fixed, usa el botón "Agregar Márgenes" para incluir márgenes externos a los extremos.


Si tienes consejos o mejoras me dejas un comentario!!!
plugins.tagline: Crea grillas rapidamente en un frame para tus diseños responsivos

plugins.name: TokenKebab Converter
plugins.description:
Purpose

This Figma plugin is designed to facilitate a smoother transition between design and development stages, particularly for those utilizing the Tokens Studio and EightShapes in their design system workflow.

Key Functionality

  • Typography Token Transformation:
  • Converts typography tokens defined in dot notation (e.g., typography.Body.Bold) into an appropriate Sass mixin structure (e.g., @include fontStyle(body-bold);).
  • Kebab-Case Conversion:
  • Transforms tokens, including those related to spacing (e.g., spacing.150), into a kebab-case format, ensuring consistency and CSS-friendly naming conventions (e.g., spacing-150).
  • Theme Prefixing:
  • Automatically prefixes theme-related tokens with "light-", changing, for instance, theme.input.border.default to light-theme-input-border-default.

In essence, the plugin programmatically refactors design tokens, enhancing their usability and implementability in CSS/Sass codebases, and ensuring a coherent and systematic naming convention throughout the design-to-development handoff process.
plugins.tagline: Ensuring Consistency from Design Tokens to Implementation

plugins.name: Golden Ratio
plugins.description:

plugins.name: Perceptually Uniform Gradients
plugins.description:
By default, Figma can generate some gradients that get really muddy as they transition from color to color. With this plugin you can generate gradients using color models which handle interpolation better, which translates to more beautiful gradients.


Features:

  1. Generate gradients in Lab, OKLCH, or LCH and insert them into your Figma files as a continuous gradient or as individual, evenly-spaced stops
  2. Extract key colors from your current selection
  3. Copy raw text color scales out of the plugin in JSON format
  4. Generate multi-hue gradients
  5. Automatically correct the lightness distributions of your gradients
  6. Generate bezier-curved gradients in the Lab color space
  7. Adjust the gamma distribution of your gradients
  8. Select colors from a curated library of options
  9. Drag and drop to reorder colors
plugins.tagline: Generate more beautiful gradients by interpolating them with perceptually uniform color models.

plugins.name: Image Text Extractor (AI)
plugins.description:
Simply select any image layer or frame, click "Extract Text," and watch as the plugin captures all visible text while preserving line breaks and formatting.


Add extracted text directly to your Figma designs with a single click - either as a single element or separated by line breaks.


Unlike other OCR solutions, our plugin works entirely within Figma, eliminating the need to switch between apps or use external services.


Powered by Google's Gemini 1.5 Flash model, it delivers superior accuracy with support for multiple languages and complex layouts.


Perfect for designers working with client mockups, UI screenshots, or any design asset containing text that needs to be extracted and edited.

plugins.name: BuilderFlash
plugins.description:
Builder Flash is a powerful tool designed to streamline your Figma workflow. With this plugin, you can effortlessly transform JSON data into fully realized layouts in Figma. Whether you're designing a website header, app interface, or any other visual element, this plugin simplifies the process.


Example JSON Data:


https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moluskorp/Flowflash/main/json.txt


Just copy and paste in the TextInput


How It Works:

  1. Upload JSON: Simply provide your JSON data, like the example above.
  2. Generate Layout: The plugin will parse the JSON and generate a Figma layout based on the structure and properties defined in your JSON.
  3. Customize: Once the layout is generated, you can easily customize it further to suit your design needs.

Features:

  • Supports a variety of design elements, including frames, rectangles, text, and more.
  • Maintains accuracy and fidelity when translating JSON data to Figma components.
  • Saves you time and effort by automating the layout creation process.
  • Intuitive and user-friendly interface for a seamless experience.

Enhance your design workflow and save valuable time with the JSON to Figma Layout Generator. Say goodbye to manual design work and hello to efficiency!

Try it out with the provided JSON example for testing purposes.

Note: The JSON example provided here is for demonstration purposes only. Replace it with your actual JSON data to generate your desired layout.
plugins.tagline: Generates canvas through JSON

plugins.name: Chartific - Create charts with your own data
plugins.description:
Chartific: Create Charts with Your Own Data

Upload CSV or JSON file then create chart with your real data, no more dummy charts!


🚀 Why Chartific?

Say goodbye to placeholder charts and hello to data-driven design. Chartific transforms your raw data into beautiful, customizable visualizations directly in Figma:

  1. Instant Data Import: Drag and drop CSV or JSON files
  2. Real Data Visualization: Create charts with your actual data
  3. Seamless Figma Integration: Native plugin that works right in your design environment
  4. Flexible Customization: Choose your chart type, color, and data fields


🎨 Features

Multiple File Formats: Import CSV and JSON files


Chart Types:

  1. Bar Charts
  2. Line Charts
  3. (More chart types coming soon!)


Color Customization:

  1. Pick any color
  2. Use existing Figma color styles
  3. Responsive Design: Charts that scale perfectly with your Figma frames


📝 How to Use

  1. Open Chartific in Figma
  2. Drag and drop your CSV or JSON file
  3. Select label and value columns
  4. Choose chart type and color
  5. Click "Create in Figma"


🔜 Coming Soon

  1. Pie Charts
  2. Area Charts
  3. Advanced styling options
  4. More data visualization features!


🆘 Support & Feedback

  1. Encountered a bug? Report an Issue
  2. Questions or suggestions? Contact Us


Price: One-time $5 investment to supercharge your design workflow.
